FAQs

What are the most popular mobile phone brands at Sharaf DG Abu Dhabi and Dubai?

Sharaf DG offers a wide range of smartphones from top brands like Samsung, Apple, Huawei, Xiaomi, Oppo, Realme, and more. Explore the best mobile phone deals in Dubai and Abu Dhabi with exclusive offers online and in-store.

Do you offer home delivery across UAE?

Yes, Sharaf DG offers fast delivery across UAE, including Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, and other Emirates. Enjoy next-day or same-day delivery on eligible products with free delivery on certain orders.

How does the Sharaf DG Trade-In Program work for mobile phones?

Sharaf DG’s Trade-In Program allows you to upgrade to the latest mobile phones by trading in your old device. Simply bring your old phone to a Sharaf DG store or use the online portal for a quick evaluation and get up to AED 4,000 off your new purchase.

Can I buy products on installments using Tamara or Tabby?

Yes, Sharaf DG offers flexible payment options through Tabby, Tamara, and credit cards, allowing you to shop and pay in installments. Whether purchasing electronics, home appliances, or smartphones, you can enjoy interest-free payments.

Does Sharaf DG offer extended warranties on electronics?

Yes, Sharaf DG provides extended warranty options through DG Shield and DG Plus. These plans cover accidental damage, hardware repairs, and more for peace of mind after your purchase.

Can I pick up my order in-store at Sharaf DG?

Yes, Sharaf DG offers a Click & Collect service. Order online and pick up your items at any Sharaf DG store in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, or Sharjah. Enjoy the flexibility of shopping online and collecting your items at your convenience.
